scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run -s serve || npm run -s dev
scripts.deploy: yarn test && yarn build && yarn deploy:tag && yarn deploy:publish_build
scripts.deploy:tag: git add build && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version
scripts.deploy:publish_build: git subtree split --prefix build -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages
